step.cmd: Create a new fragment of type Extended Tooltip.
Drag and Drop attributes you want in the extended tooltip within the fragment grid.
Open the module where you want the extended tooltip to be displayed.
Click on the module element that will hold the extended tooltip and go to the properties view .
Select the XTooltip properties tab and click on the Include Xtooltip Fragment property.
Click on the icon placed on the right of the property value.
step.stepresult: A dialog box provides browse for fragments of type Extended Tooltip.

step.cmd: Select your extended tooltip fragment from the list. Enter a "*" for listing all existing extended tooltip.
Set the Hold tooltip window property if necessary.

For extended tooltip set on table elements, attributes composing the extended tooltip fragment must be declared in the table. Use the Extra tab of the table Transformation to add missing attributes. If the extended tooltip is set on a table tree node, create accurate aggregation of displayed attributes in the table Transformation .
